column1: Little Goat Diner////Popped in for a simple breakfast with my friend. I wanted something healthy but then again not (I was conflicted because everything sounded so perfectly delicious- it didn't help that we sat right by the kitchen so could see every item that people were ordering) so I left my decision to Yelp! I decided to read the first review that popped up and get the same thing the last reviewer mentioned. So I ended up getting the breakfast paratha burrito! I'm Indian and parathas are an Indian thing. It didn't disappoint
column2: the black bean corn salad on top was the perfect amount of healthy I wanted and the paratha was stuffed with two perfectly cooked eggs. Only thing I wished was that it had more of an Indian kick to it which would've brought the flavors full circle
column3: which Is why I rate it at 4
